job_description:
Company Description




Job Description


Join our Data Science team and make the magic happen. We drive business processes like pricing and many more with the use of sophisticated algorithms. For this purpose, we design, develop, and maintain state of the art machine learning models and manifold optimization solvers as well as simulation models. As a member of this team, your work will improve the experience of millions of our customers and have a direct impact on our business results. Sounds interesting? Apply now and join our journey.

YOUR ROLE AT SIXT

 * You engage with technical, product and business stakeholders to translate business problems into technical solutions
 * You work closely with software development engineers, data scientists, MLOps engineers, product and business owners to design and implement Generative AI driven solutions balancing benefits of custom solutions and standardization opportunities ensuring production grade services
 * You collaborate with technical stakeholders to enhance the experience and efficiency of our software development processes and enable our software development engineers to utilize Generative AI in our products
 * You share your knowledge and learnings about ML engineering best practices with colleagues in data science and other teams to extend overall technical knowledge
 * You bring in your design and development experience related to efficient and proven Generative AI governance frameworks

YOUR SKILLS MATTER

 * You have strong hands-on experience in Engineering and Generative AI and a solid knowledge of Python as well as AWS cloud technologies
 * You have practical experience with Open AI or AWS Bedrock and with the open-source models, e.g. Llama
 * You have worked with Generative AI orchestration frameworks like LangChain and are in addition capable of Java or Go
 * You are aware of LLMOps paradigm and applied it in various Generative AI projects. You have experience with continuous integration/continuous deployment approaches.
 * You interact efficiently with stakeholders in business, product, software development engineering and data science
 * You communicate fluently in English

WHAT WE OFFER

 * Work-life balance Enjoy 30 days of vacation and up to 50% remote work, including up to 30 days per year in European countries (EU, CH & UK), as well as flexible working hours
 * Office Perks Stay active and healthy with our modern SIXT Gym, and various recreational activities, including a gaming area and the SIXT choir. Plus, enjoy our premium employee restaurant, offering more than just the standard canteen
 * Support for Community Engagement Take a day each year to volunteer with the ""Drying Little Tears"" children's aid foundation, an initiative of Regine Sixt
 * Great Employee Benefits Benefit from discounts on SIXT rent, share, ride, and SIXT+ services, car leasing offers, and special deals with partners on travel, tech, clothing, and more
 * Mobility allowance We support you with a mobility allowance of 20€ per month
 * Enhance your future Support with your retirement planning and capital-forming benefits


Additional Information



About the department:
Engineers take note: cutting edge technology is waiting for you! We don't buy, we primarily do it all ourselves: all core systems, whether in the area of car sharing, car rental, ride hailing and much more, are developed and operated by SIXT itself. Our technical scope ranges from cloud and on-site operations through agile software development. We rely on state-of-the-art frameworks and architectures and strive for a long-term technical approach. Exciting? Then apply now!

About us:
We are a leading global mobility service provider with sales of €3.07 billion and around 9,000 employees worldwide. Our mobility platform ONE combines our products SIXT rent (car rental), SIXT share (car sharing), SIXT ride (cab, driver and chauffeur services), SIXT+ (car subscription) and gives our customers access to our fleet of 222,000 vehicles, the services of 1,500 cooperation partners and around 1.5 million drivers worldwide. Together with our franchise partners, we are present in more than 110 countries at 2,098 rental stations. At SIXT, a first-class customer experience and outstanding customer service are our top priorities. We focus on true entrepreneurship and long-term stability and align our corporate strategy with foresight. Want to take off with us and revolutionize the world of mobility? Apply now!

benefitsHighlights.highlightPhrase: Standard für Unternehmensgröse zb  Mitarbeiter Angebote

employerBenefitSummary.comment:
Arbeiten bei SIXT bedeutet nicht nur, die Zukunft der Mobilität zu gestalten, sondern bietet auch persönliche Vorteile. Das bedeutet speziell für Dich:

  • 30 Tage Urlaub
  • Unterstützung bei der Altersvorsorge
  • Vermögenswirksame Leistungen
  • Mitarbeitervorteile für SIXT rent, share, ride und SIXT+
  • Rabatte bei Partnern für Reisen, Technik, Kleidung, etc.
  • Kostenlose Cybersport-Kurse
  • Zahlreiche Schulungen für Ihre individuelle Entwicklung
  • Arbeiten Sie mit Ihren Freunden und erhalten Sie 2.000€ (brutto) Freundschaftswerbung für jede Einstellung durch Ihre Empfehlung als Mitarbeiter
  • Regelmäßige Feedbackgespräche, Mitarbeiterbefragungen
  • Gesundheitsprogramm mit psychologischer Hotline durch das Fürstenberg Institut
  • DiverSIXTy-Programm, das auf eine Unternehmenskultur der Akzeptanz, Wertschätzung und des Respekts setzt, in der jeder seine Persönlichkeit entfalten kann
  • "Work hard, play hard" - unsere Partys sind legendär!

In unseren Filialen:

  • Urlaubs-, Nachtschicht- und Sonntagsarbeitszuschläge und Aufbau von bis zu 20 Minusstunden
  • Geregelte Arbeitszeiten mit Schichtplänen ca. 3-4 Wochen im Voraus, die Ihre Wünsche und Hobbys berücksichtigen
  • Onboarding mit Trainingswoche, kontinuierlicher Austausch mit eigenem Mentor, Unterstützung durch Sales Coaches, SIXT Quizz App & vieles mehr
  • Wir stellen dir deine Designer-Uniform in mehrfacher Ausführung zur Verfügung & bezuschussen deren Reinigungskosten
     

In unserem Münchner HQ:

  • Mobilitätszuschuss von 20€/Monat
  • Flexible Arbeitszeiten
  • Bis zu 50% Ihrer monatlichen Arbeitszeit mobiles Arbeiten
  • Bezuschusstes Mitarbeiterrestaurant (und ja, wir bestehen auf Restaurant, weil es für eine Kantine zu hochwertig ist)
  • Diverse Freizeitmöglichkeiten wie z.B. die Gaming Area, die SIXT-Fußballmannschaft oder der SIXT-Chor
  • Fitnessstudio im HQ

managedContent.body:
Gestalte mit uns die Zukunft der Mobilität.   Wir sind einer der global führenden Mobilitätsdienstleister mit einem Umsatz von 3,07 Milliarden Euro und rund 7.500 Mitarbeitern weltweit. Unsere Mobilitätsplattform ONE vereint unsere Produkte SIXT rent (Autovermietung), SIXT share (Carsharing), SIXT ride (Taxi-, Fahrer- und Chauffeurdienste), SIXT (Autoabonnement) und bietet unseren Kunden Zugang zu unserer Flotte von 270.000 Fahrzeugen, den Dienstleistungen von 1.500 Kooperationspartnern und rund 5 Millionen Fahrern weltweit. Gemeinsam mit unseren Franchisepartnern sind wir in mehr als 110 Ländern an über 2.000 Mietstationen präsent. Bei SIXT stehen ein erstklassiges Kundenerlebnis und ein hervorragender Kundenservice an erster Stelle. Wir setzen auf echtes Unternehmertum und langfristige Stabilität und richten unsere Unternehmensstrategie vorausschauend aus. Und verändern damit die Art und Weise, wie sich Menschen rund um den Globus bewegen.

Der Mut zum Wandel und der Wille, Dinge wirklich bewegen zu wollen, hat SIXT in über 100 Jahren zu dem gemacht, was es heute ist – eines der innovativsten, wachstumsstärksten und profitabelsten Mobilitätsunternehmen weltweit. Überall auf der Welt bieten wir unseren Kunden, die stets im Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns stehen, jeden Tag aufs Neue individuelle, flexible und grenzenlose Mobilität und schaffen damit eine echte Alternative zum eigenen Auto. SIXT – Mobilität, die bewegt.

managedContent.body:
WARUM SIXT DICH AUF DIE ÜBERHOLSPUR BRINGT?

Teamevents
"Work hard play hard" ist bei uns Programm - unsere Partys sind legendär.

Individuelle Weiterbildung
Du kannst unser umfassendes Schulungsangebot im SIXT College kostenlos nutzen. Hier erwarten dich Online- und Präsenztrainings zu unzähligen Themengebieten.

Mitarbeiterkonditionen
Natürlich bekommst Du die besten Tarife für unsere eigenen Produkte, wie die SIXT Mietwagen & Leasing Fahrzeuge.

Wir sind bunt
Wir fordern und fördern eine Unternehmenskultur der Akzeptanz, der Wertschätzung und des Respekts, in der sich jeder mit seiner Persönlichkeit und seinen Ideen entfalten kann. Das ist DiverSIXTy.

Flexible Arbeitszeiten
Wir bieten Dir mit unseren verschiedenen Arbeitszeitmodellen ein Maximum an Flexibilität.

Die Welt ist unser Office
Bei SIXT kannst Du überall auf der Welt arbeiten und hast Kollegen auf dem ganzen Globus verteilt.

Laut, mutig, anders
Wir trauen uns Dinge, die sich andere nicht trauen und schaffen es, so vorne zu bleiben.

Ideas first
Wir glauben, dass jeder große Ideen haben und auch umsetzen kann. Dafür geben wir jedem Mitarbeiter die passenden Tools an die Hand.

Innovationsmaschine
Wir gestalten die Zukunft der Mobilität, wie unsere Plattform ONE, indem wir ständig den Status quo hinterfragen.

Immer agil
Wir setzen Entscheidungen schnell und gezielt um. Dass wir das schaffen, liegt vor allem an unseren flachen Hierarchien.
managedContent.title: Karriere

managedContent.body:
Das operative Geschäft in unseren Filialen ist der Herzschlag von SIXT. Unsere Kollegen rund um die Welt beweisen, dass Leidenschaft, harte Arbeit und unermüdliches Engagement für unsere Kunden für uns nicht nur Worte sind, sondern der Treibstoff für unsere globale Erfolgsgeschichte als Premium-Mobilitätsanbieter. Ein Teil von SIXT zu sein, ist nicht nur ein Job, sondern eine spannende und erfüllende Reise, bei der der Spaß im Vordergrund steht! Komm zu uns und lassen Sie uns die Art und Weise, wie sich die Welt bewegt, neu definieren.

SIXT ist ein spannender Arbeitgeber für motivierte Talente aus den Bereichen Gastronomie, Einzelhandel, Automobil, Dienstleistung oder Verkauf. Wir sind auf ständigem Wachstumskurs und es gibt viele Möglichkeiten für Dich, bei uns einzusteigen. Die Arbeit in unseren Filialen bedeutet, dass Du in den direkten Kundenservice eingebunden bist und Dich täglich mit unseren operativen Kennzahlen und dem Vermietungsprozess befasst, wobei Du unsere Servicequalität stets vorantreibst.

managedContent.body:
Wir sind ein Team von Macherinnen und Machern, das ständig nach erstklassigen Lösungen strebt. Wenn etwas nicht klappt, versuchen wir es noch einmal. 

Wir kaufen dabei nicht, wir machen vor allem alles selbst: Alle Kernsysteme, ob im Bereich Carsharing, Autovermietung, Ridehailing und vieles mehr, werden von SIXT selbst entwickelt und betrieben. Unsere technische Bandbreite reicht vom Cloud- und Vor-Ort-Betrieb bis hin zur agilen Softwareentwicklung. Wir setzen auf modernste Frameworks und Architekturen und streben einen langfristigen technischen Ansatz an.

managedContent.body:
Du suchst nach Deinem Hochschulabschluss den idealen Einstieg ins Berufsleben? Hast eine Weiterbildung zum Fachwirt / Betriebswirt absolviert oder bereits Berufserfahrung mit ersten Berührungspunkten in Führung von Mitarbeitern gesammelt und möchtest den nächsten Schritt zur Führungskraft beschreiten? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt als Trainee für unsere Filialen.

In unserem 12-monatigen Traineeship lernst Du unser Unternehmen kennen und baust gleichzeitig Deine Führungskompetenzen aus. Schritt für Schritt erlernst Du die Kunst, Mitarbeiter zu führen. Du zeigst bei der Fuhrparkplanung sowie der betriebswirtschaftlichen Steuerung der Filiale, welche analytischen Fähigkeiten in Dir stecken. Du bearbeitest während Deines Traineeships eigenständig ein spannendes Projekt, bei dem Du SIXT aus einem weiteren Blickwinkel kennenlernst.
managedContent.title: Management Traineeship

job_description:
Du hast ein ausgeprägtes Qualitätsbewusstsein und Freude daran, komplexe Systeme auf Herz und Nieren zu prüfen? Fehler zu finden reicht Dir nicht – Du willst aktiv zur Verbesserung beitragen?

Als Test Automation Engineer gestaltest Du den gesamten Prozess der Testautomatisierung: Du entwickelst und implementierst maßgeschneiderte Lösungen, führst automatisierte Tests durch und optimierst kontinuierlich die Testprozesse. Dabei arbeitest Du eng mit Entwicklern zusammen, um die Qualität der Software sicherzustellen und die Effizienz der Tests zu steigern. Du überwachst die Testergebnisse, identifizierst Schwachstellen und hilfst, diese zu beheben. So leistest Du einen entscheidenden Beitrag zur Verbesserung unserer Produkte.


WIR PASSEN UNSERE ERWARTUNGEN AN DEINEN ERFAHRUNGSSCHATZ AN. GEHE DIE NÄCHSTEN SCHRITTE GEMEINSAM MIT DEM TEAM UND DEINEM PSL.


DU …

 * planst und führst automatisierte Tests (z.B. UI, API, Integrationstests) für verschiedene Projekte durch, um deren Funktionalität und Stabilität sicherzustellen.
 * entwickelst, implementierst und wartest maßgeschneiderte Testautomatisierungslösungen für unterschiedliche Projekte.
 * analysierst und optimierst die Testautomatisierungsprozesse, um die Effizienz zu steigern und die Testabdeckung zu erweitern.
 * arbeitest eng mit dem Team zusammen, um Teststrategien zu entwickeln und deren Implementierung zu begleiten.
 * überwachst und dokumentierst Testergebnisse, identifizierst Schwachstellen und Probleme und unterstützt bei deren Behebung.
 * hilfst automatisierte Tests in CI/CD-Pipelines zu integrieren, um die Entwicklungs- und Release-Prozesse zu verbessern.


DAS BRINGST
DU MIT

 * Berufserfahrung im Bereich Testing in der Softwareentwicklung, entsprechende Weiterbildung (ISTQB-Zertifizierung) von Vorteil
 * ein gutes technisches Verständnis für moderne Webanwendungen und Testinfrastrukturen
 * Grundkenntnisse in Testmethoden und die Fähigkeit, unsere Kunden proaktiv in der Wahl der passenden Teststrategie zu beraten
 * Erfahrung mit Testautomatisierungstools wie z.B. Selenium, JUnit, Cypress, Appium
 * Kenntnisse in der Erstellung und Ausführung von API-Tests, z.B. mit Postman
 * Freude daran, Dir neue Themen anzueignen
 * ausgeprägtes Qualitätsbewusstsein
 * ziel- und lösungsorientiertes Denken kombiniert mit einer eigenverantwortlichen Arbeitsweise
 * Kommunikationsstärke sowie Spaß an der Teamarbeit
 * Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse


DEIN ARBEITSUMFELD BEI SPRINTEINS




 * TEAMWORK
   
   Als agiles Team aus bis zu acht Expert:innen tragt ihr gemeinsam die End-to-End-Verantwortung für die Software. Ihr deployed fertige Komponenten in der Cloud und kommuniziert direkt mit Anwender:innen aus verschiedensten Branchen.


 * METHODIK & TECHNOLOGIE
   
   Ihr verfügt über Skills aus den Bereichen Agile, UX, Development, Release Engineering, Architecture und AI.

   


 * PEOPLE SUCCESS LEAD
   
   Deine:n Vorgesetzte:n wählst Du selbst. Gemeinsam gestaltet ihr Deine Entwicklung und Weiterbildung.


 * WEITERBILDUNG
   
   In der SprintEins aka lernst Du Hard und Soft Skills aus allen Wissensbereichen – von erfahrenen Leads und Kolleg:innen.

   


 * WORK & LIFE
   
   Wir sorgen für ein Umfeld, in dem Du die Balance zwischen privatem und beruflichem Leben halten kannst.

   


 * FLEXIBLES ARBEITEN
   
   Wo, wann und wie Du arbeitest, stimmst Du mit Deinem Team ab.


 * BENEFITS
   
   Sind ja eh Standard.



DIE ÜBERLASSEN WIR DEINER KREATIVITÄT. AUF DEN INHALT KOMMT ES AN.

Koordiniert wird der Bewerbungsprozess von Karin, Sabine & Jenny. Deine Ansprechpartnerin Karin Bilsing freut sich schon, von Dir zu hören.

Bewirb Dich ganz einfach personal@sprinteins.com.

  • Methodik & Technologie

    Ihr verfügt über Skills aus den Bereichen Agile, UX, Development, Release Engineering, Architecture und AI.

    Deine:n Vorgesetzte:n wählst Du selbst. Gemeinsam gestaltet ihr Deine Entwicklung und Weiterbildung.

    In der SprintEins aka lernst Du Hard und Soft Skills aus allen Wissensbereichen – von erfahrenen Leads und Kolleg:innen.

    Wir sorgen für ein Umfeld, in dem Du die Balance zwischen privatem und beruflichem Leben halten kannst.

    Sind ja eh Standard.

job.description:
Du hast ein ausgeprägtes Qualitätsbewusstsein und Freude daran, komplexe Systeme auf Herz und Nieren zu prüfen? Fehler zu finden reicht Dir nicht – Du willst aktiv zur Verbesserung beitragen?

Als Test Automation Engineer gestaltest Du den gesamten Prozess der Testautomatisierung: Du entwickelst und implementierst maßgeschneiderte Lösungen, führst automatisierte Tests durch und optimierst kontinuierlich die Testprozesse. Dabei arbeitest Du eng mit Entwicklern zusammen, um die Qualität der Software sicherzustellen und die Effizienz der Tests zu steigern. Du überwachst die Testergebnisse, identifizierst Schwachstellen und hilfst, diese zu beheben. So leistest Du einen entscheidenden Beitrag zur Verbesserung unserer Produkte.

Wir passen unsere Erwartungen an Deinen Erfahrungsschatz an. Gehe die nächsten Schritte gemeinsam mit dem Team und Deinem PSL.

Du …

  • planst und führst automatisierte Tests (z.B. UI, API, Integrationstests) für verschiedene Projekte durch, um deren Funktionalität und Stabilität sicherzustellen.
  • entwickelst, implementierst und wartest maßgeschneiderte Testautomatisierungslösungen für unterschiedliche Projekte.
  • analysierst und optimierst die Testautomatisierungsprozesse, um die Effizienz zu steigern und die Testabdeckung zu erweitern.
  • arbeitest eng mit dem Team zusammen, um Teststrategien zu entwickeln und deren Implementierung zu begleiten.
  • überwachst und dokumentierst Testergebnisse, identifizierst Schwachstellen und Probleme und unterstützt bei deren Behebung.
  • hilfst automatisierte Tests in CI/CD-Pipelines zu integrieren, um die Entwicklungs- und Release-Prozesse zu verbessern.

Das bringst
Du mit

  • Berufserfahrung im Bereich Testing in der Softwareentwicklung, entsprechende Weiterbildung (ISTQB-Zertifizierung) von Vorteil
  • ein gutes technisches Verständnis für moderne Webanwendungen und Testinfrastrukturen
  • Grundkenntnisse in Testmethoden und die Fähigkeit, unsere Kunden proaktiv in der Wahl der passenden Teststrategie zu beraten
  • Erfahrung mit Testautomatisierungstools wie z.B. Selenium, JUnit, Cypress, Appium
  • Kenntnisse in der Erstellung und Ausführung von API-Tests, z.B. mit Postman
  • Freude daran, Dir neue Themen anzueignen
  • ausgeprägtes Qualitätsbewusstsein
  • ziel- und lösungsorientiertes Denken kombiniert mit einer eigenverantwortlichen Arbeitsweise
  • Kommunikationsstärke sowie Spaß an der Teamarbeit
  • Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse

job_title: Senior AI Software Engineer (Medical Imaging) - m/f/d
job_description:
J O B S vivascope.com

Work at VivaScope



One team. One goal. We want to save time, with innovative medical products & workflows. Targeted. Precise. Committed. Are you as fascinated by
medical technology as we are? Then you've come to the right place! Our laser is changing cancer diagnostics with state-of-the-art technology - for
patients and doctors worldwide. And that's exactly why we need your support. VivaScope GmbH is a Munich-based company that has been
operating under the umbrella of MAVIG GmbH for 15 years. Since January 2021 we are operating as an independent company. We are developer,
manufacturer and distributor of confocal laser scanning microscopes that enable time-efficient and non-invasive analysis to quickly distinguish
between pathogenic and healthy tissue.

We are developing new and improving existing software in-house and with partners and are looking for a highly skilled, independent Senior AI
Software Engineer to join our team. This is a pioneering role, as you will be the first AI expert in a team of software engineers with expertise outside
the AI field. You will play a crucial role in designing and implementing machine learning solutions to analyse confocal microscopy images of various
tissues, helping us identify and classify different types of lesions.

You must have a proven track record in AI/ML, particularly with image analysis, and be confident working independently to drive the project from
conception to production. You will be working on a project with cooperation partners from different disciplines and strong communication skills are
essential, as you will need to explain complex AI concepts and project progress within the project team and also to non-specialist colleagues.

Senior AI Software Engineer (Medical Imaging) (m/f/d)
Key Responsibilities: Required Skills and Qualifications

• Develop and Deploy AI Solutions: Lead the end-to-end • Hands-on AI/ML Experience (5+ years): Proven expertise in machine
development of an AI model to classify tissue lesions from learning with a focus on computer vision and medical imaging.
confocal microscopy images. • Strong Knowledge of Deep Learning Frameworks: Extensive

 * Image Data Processing: Prepare, process, and augment datasets experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks.

to ensure quality and variety in training data. • Experience with Image Data and Annotation: Skilled in processing
 * Model Selection and Training: Select suitable model and working with annotated datasets, including data augmentation

architectures (e.g., CNNs, transformers) and frameworks; train and preparation.
and validate models to achieve high diagnostic accuracy. • Model Optimization: Ability to optimize models for performance
 * Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Work with a team of and efficiency, especially for high-resolution images.

software engineers to integrate AI solutions into our workflow; • Programming Skills: Strong in Python; experience with cloud
document and explain AI methods to team members effectively. platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP) for deploying machine learning models.

• Continuous Improvement: Keep up with advancements in AI, • Independent Problem-Solver: Proven ability to work autonomously
especially in medical image analysis, and continuously improve in designing and delivering AI projects, with minimal guidance.
the model with new data. • Effective Communication Skills: Fluent in English, with the ability to

clearly explain complex AI concepts to non-AI experts.

Preferred Additional Skills

 * Medical Imaging Background: Prior experience working with medical or biological image data, such as histology or confocal microscopy

images, is a strong advantage.
 * Experience in Computer Vision for Medical Applications: Familiarity with transfer learning, segmentation, and classification techniques in

medical imaging.
 * Knowledge of DICOM and Medical Data Standards: Experience with handling and managing DICOM files and working with healthcare data

standards.
 * Project Management Skills: Ability to manage AI project timelines and milestones effectively.

What We Offer:

• Flexible working & homeoffice • Short decision-making-processes and

 * Modern offices short communication channels

• Young and diverse team from different nations • 30 days vacation
• Individual opportunities for further training • Company pension plan
• Staff events • and more corporate benefits

If you enjoy working in a technically demanding environment and are interested in varied and complex tasks, we look forward to receiving your
informative application documents by e-mail in PDF format, including details of your salary expectations.
VivaScope GmbH · Stahlgruberring 5 · 81829 Munich · www.vivascope.de
Michael Merz · Tel.: +49 (0) 89 / 4 20 960 · EMail: bewerbung(at)vivascope.com



MAVIG GmbH Stahlgruberring 5 Kontakt: Michael Merz Tel.: +49 (0) 89 / 4 20 96 - 0

81829 München E-Mail: bewerbung@mavig.com www.mavig.com

job_description:
Munich, Germany

Are you passionate about technology and its potential to disrupt the financial industry? At CRX Markets, we are always on the lookout for innovative thinkers. We offer a platform to elevate your professional journey through hands-on experience in a cutting-edge FinTech environment. Built for the cloud, our platform ensures high scalability and resilience and interfaces with external systems via robust middleware. While we’ve already partnered with some of the world’s leading multinationals, our mission to stay at the forefront of innovation drives us to seek top talent to join our team.


YOUR ROLE

 * Develop and enhance the platform using advanced software practices and methodologies
 * Participate in requirements engineering, ensuring alignment with the Disciplined Agile principles
 * Collaborate with CRX teams to design interfaces for inter-service interaction.
 * Design at both high- and low-levels, create prototypes, and join in reviews
 * Uphold top-tier Testing & Quality Assurance standards, utilizing unit testing, integration testing, and other validation methods
 * Lead and engage in Code Reviews, promoting continuous improvement, best practices, and collaborative learning
 * Research & evaluate new technologies for potential integration into our platform
 * Mentor junior team members to elevate the team’s performance


YOUR PROFILE

 * Excellent programming aptitude and the capacity for logical and abstract thinking
 * A team player dedicated to delivering outstanding results in a dynamic, fast-paced setting
 * Deep knowledge in technologies for building large Microservice Landscapes in Java:
   * Frameworks (DI, Web, Security, etc.)
   * Relational databases (JDBC, JPA, JOOQ, etc.)
   * REST Web services (SOAP is a plus)
   * Messaging (Kafka or similar)
   * Containers and orchestration (Docker, K8s, etc.)
   * Architectural patterns (microservices, message queues, integration, etc.)
 * Proficiency with a JavaScript frontend stack, such as React or AngularJS, is a plus


OUR OFFER

This position provides the opportunity to be part of a great team in a fast-paced FinTech environment. You get the unique chance to push your career by gaining first-hand business experience from a network of the most innovative and capable minds in the German finance industry. While aligning CRX’s long-term goals with our employees’ compensation, we offer an attractive package with several perks and benefits.

Are you up for the challenge? Please upload your documents including CV, cover letter and your earliest possible starting date.



DIMITRI ALEXEEV, CTO

Who are we looking for?

"It takes a united team to change the face of Working Capital Financing market at scale. At CRX Markets, you will work in a great team of talented engineers to shape new products from scratch and enhance capabilities of the existing product portfolio. Be a part of our roster."

job_description:
Du hast Freude daran, enge Beziehungen zu Kunden aufzubauen und ihnen dabei zu helfen, ihre Herausforderungen mit innovativen Lösungen zu meistern?

Bei CmdScale hast die Möglichkeit, mehrere interne Accounts zu managen und gleichzeitig in einzelnen Kundenprojekten als Projektmanager: in aufzutreten

Du willst dich entwickeln und hast keine Lust mehr auf starre Strukturen? Dann freuen wir uns darauf, mit dir zu wachsen!

Aufgaben

Dein Impact

Als Projektmanager (m/w/d) arbeitest du eng mit unseren Kunden und internen Teams zusammen, um sicherzustellen, dass unsere Beratung den höchsten Mehrwert bietet. Du begleitest unsere Kunden während des gesamten Lebenszyklus – von der Implementierung bis hin zur fortlaufenden Betreuung – und bist deren zentrale: r Ansprechpartner: in für technische und strategische Fragen.

Deine Aufgaben:

 * Betreuung und Entwicklung von Schlüsselkunden, um langfristige Partnerschaften zu gewährleisten
 * Sicherstellung des erfolgreichen Einsatzes unserer Dienstleistungen durch unsere Kunden und Identifikation von Optimierungsmöglichkeiten
 * Proaktives Monitoring der Kundenzufriedenheit und frühzeitiges Erkennen von Problemen oder Chancen
 * Zusammenarbeit mit dem Vertriebsteam zur Entwicklung individueller Kundenstrategien und Identifikation von Upsell- und Cross-Sell-Möglichkeiten
 * Koordination von Ressourcen und Lösungen zwischen Kunden und internen Entwicklerteams
 * Unterstützung bei der Durchführung von Proof of Concepts (PoCs) und der technischen Implementierung
 * Teilnahme an Kundenmeetings und Branchenveranstaltungen, um Netzwerke zu erweitern und neue Geschäftsmöglichkeiten zu fördern

Qualifikation

Dein Skillset:

 * Erfahrung im Kundenmanagement: Du hast mindestens 2-3 Jahre Erfahrung im Customer Success, Key Account Management oder einer vergleichbaren Rolle, idealerweise im technischen Umfeld.
 * Technisches Verständnis: Du verfügst über ein gutes Verständnis für technische Lösungen und kannst komplexe Sachverhalte verständlich erklären.
 * Kommunikationsstärke: Du bist stark in der Kommunikation – ob schriftlich, mündlich oder im direkten Kundenkontakt – und weißt, wie man Vertrauen aufbaut und pflegt.
 * Analytische Fähigkeiten: Du erkennst schnell die Bedürfnisse der Kunden und kannst diese in maßgeschneiderte Lösungen umsetzen.
 * Eigenständigkeit: Du schätzt Entscheidungsfreiheit in Bezug auf Arbeitszeit und -ort und bringst gleichzeitig eine hohe Verantwortungsbereitschaft mit.
 * Problem-Lösungs-Kompetenz: Du bist in der Lage, proaktiv Herausforderungen zu erkennen und Lösungen zu entwickeln, die sowohl dem Kunden als auch dem Unternehmen zugutekommen.

Benefits

  • Proaktives Monitoring der Kundenzufriedenheit und frühzeitiges Erkennen von Problemen oder Chancen

job_description:
As a Software Developer AI (m/f/d) you will join the R&D organization providing technologies to all the brands of Dassault Systemes, and solve computer graphics problems efficiently with artificial intelligence.


RESPONSIBILITIES

 * Specification, development, optimization, automated testing, maintenance and deployment of AI-based software components and software services related to computer graphics in the 3DEXPERIENCE platform.
 * Contributing to an agile team of software developers (software architecture, specification, implementation, testing, optimization)
 * Collaborating with software developers, rendering experts, QA, application developers, locally as well as worldwide across the company
 * Evolving, maintaining, and optimizing our continuous integration pipeline
 * Staying up-to-date with state of the art in AI for computer graphics


QUALIFICATIONS

 * Experience working independently and collaboratively within an agile team, with a minimum of 3 years of work experience as a Software Engineer with a complex code base.
 * Strong skills in Python and modern C++
 * Experience building and deploying AI-based software components by assembling existing AI components, fine-tuning existing models, or training models from scratch; includes prompt-engineering skills
 * Good knowledge of Computer Graphics (Physically Based Rendering, image generation workflows, high-performance rendering on GPUs)
 * Proficiency with PyTorch and numpy
 * Knowledge of GIT and continuous integration tools is a plus
 * Focus on software quality and customer orientation


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU

 * Your code contributions will have a huge industry footprint and each new feature and optimization will impact many users of the Dassault Systèmes software portfolio.
 * Work in an international agile team of like-minded enthusiasts
 * Opportunity to work with many different teams that are distributed all across the world to solve problems and enhance our product.

Interested? Click on "Apply" to access the 3DS job portal and to upload your application documents.


DIVERSITY STATEMENT

As a game-changer in sustainable technology and innovation, Dassault Systèmes is striving to build more inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. We believe that our people are our number one asset and we want all employees to feel empowered to bring their whole selves to work every day. It is our goal that our people feel a sense of pride and a passion for belonging. As a company leading change, it’s our responsibility to foster opportunities for all people to participate in a harmonized Workforce of the Future.

managedContent.body:
Wo auch immer du bist, was auch immer du machst, Dassault Systèmes begleitet dich

Life Sciences und Gesundheit, Städte und Infrastruktur, Fertigungsindustrie: Dassault Systèmes ist immer an deiner Seite.

Wir sind davon überzeugt, dass der Fortschritt die Essenz des Menschen ist, und begleiten Unternehmen und Menschen auf der ganzen Wir helfen Ihnen, die nachhaltigen Innovationen von heute und morgen zu schaffen un die großen Herausforderungen zu meistern, denen sich Patienten, Bürger und Verbraucher gegenübersehen.

Werde Teil eines weltweit führenden Unternehmens, um eine Welt zu schaffen, in der Produkte, Natur und Leben in völliger Harmonie zusammenleben!

managedContent.body:
We Imagine New Horizons

Dassault Systèmes ist eine Gemeinschaft von mehr als 23.400 begeisterten Menschen auf der ganzen Welt, die durch ihre Vielfalt und eine gemeinsame Denkweise und Werte vereint sind. Wir lieben es, neue Wege zu gehen, weil wir davon überzeugt sind, dass wir dank unserer Gemeinschaft echte Veränderungen bewirken können.

Möchtest du zu den Vorreitern im Bereich der nachhaltigen Technologie und Innovation gehören? Bist du leidenschaftlich und am kontinuierlichen Lernen interessiert? Strebst du nach einem Umfeld, in dem du dich voll und ganz einbringen kannst? Bist du auch eine Person, die von einem höheren Ziel angetrieben wird?

Dann nimm noch heute die Herausforderungen an! Besuchen Sie unsere offenen Stellen Hier.
managedContent.title: UNSERE TEAMS
videos: <iframe width="1280" height="720" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/A9zdHyHi50o" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Wir stellen den Status quo in Frage.

Wir tragen kontinuierlich dazu bei, eine gesündere Zukunft für unseren Planeten zu gestalten. Wir bieten fortschrittliche Technologien an, die Menschen auf der ganzen Welt dabei helfen, Innovationen nachhaltig zu konzipieren, zu testen und zu industrialisieren Wir arbeiten, mit Experten zusammen, um die Art und Weise zu revolutionieren, wie Menschen arbeiten, produzieren und Innovationen schaffen, um den CO2-Fußabdruck zu reduzieren. Selbstverständlich beteiligen wir uns auch am JOBRAD-Programm.
managedContent.title: UNSERE VERPFLICHTUNGEN
videos: <iframe width="853" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vGiKXRTPtWA" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Wir bringen unsere Gemeinschaft zusammen

Als Wegbereiter für nachhaltige Technologien und Innovationen strebt Dassault Systèmes danach, integrativere und vielfältigere Teams auf der ganzen Welt aufzubauen.

Mit dem globalen Programm 3DS WIN (Women INitiative) verpflichten wir uns, die Geschlechtervielfalt in unserem Unternehmen zu fördern, indem wir Mädchen und Frauen ermutigen, eine wissenschaftliche Laufbahn einzuschlagen und sie in ihrer beruflichen Entwicklung unterstützen.

Unsere Verpflichtung: unsere Teams auf ihrem Weg zu Ausbildung und Wachstum zu begleiten.

Die 3DEXPERIENCE University wurde gegründet, um allen Mitarbeitern von Dassault Systèmes den Zugang zu einem breiten Spektrum an Schulungen zu ermöglichen, um unser Wissen und Können in Bereichen, die mit unseren Lösungen und unserer beruflichen Expertise zusammenhängen, kontinuierlich zu verbessern.

Wir fördern Ihre Leidenschaft für das Lernen.

Unsere Stärke liegt darin, Wissen und Know-how zu teilen und während unserer gesamten beruflichen Karriere weiter zu lernen.

Wir bieten verschiedene Programme zur beruflichen Weiterentwicklung unserer Mitarbeiter. Unser Programm "Rise Up" hilft unseren Mitarbeitern, ihre Führungsqualitäten zu verbessern und funktionsübergreifende Aufgaben zu übernehmen. Darüber hinaus bieten wir regelmäßige "Lunch & Learn"-Talks an, in denen spannende Neuigkeiten präsentiert werden. Jeder Mitarbeiter hat außerdem Zugang zu LinkedIn Learning, um kontinuierlich dazuzulernen.
managedContent.title: UNSERE BERUFLICHEN WERDEGANGE
videos: <iframe width="853" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E9YpmASLOEE" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Träumst du von einem Praktikum oder einer Ausbildung, die Innovation, Herausforderungen und spannende Aufgaben vereint?

Bei Dassault Systèmes hast du die Chance, genau das zu erleben! Über 160 Werkstudenten und Praktikanten haben im letzten Jahr in verschiedenen Teams mitgewirkt und dazu beigetragen, unsere Vision einer nachhaltigen Zukunft zu verwirklichen.

Werde Teil einer lebendigen Gemeinschaft!

Als Praktikant oder Werkstudent bist du bei uns nicht allein: Du wirst Teil eines Netzwerks aus jungen Talenten und profitierst von einem vielfältigen Angebot an Lernmöglichkeiten. Freue dich auf wöchentliche Mittagessen, Afterwork-Events, fachspezifische Konferenzen, ein Mentorenprogramm, spannende Wochenendausflüge ins Ausland und vieles mehr!

Ein Sprungbrett für deine Zukunft!

Wir legen großen Wert darauf, unsere Nachwuchstalente auf ihrem Weg in die Arbeitswelt zu unterstützen und sie zur „Workforce of the Future“ auszubilden. Wir helfen dir, den richtigen Karriereweg zu finden.

job_description:
At E.ON’s Future Lab, we develop and incubate inventions and intellectual property from emerging digital technologies in the areas of robotics, industrial IIoT and AI that enable a sustainable energy future. With a multidisciplinary team consisting of experts in the areas of Energy-, Electronics- and Electrical Engineering, Computer- and Data Science, as well as Digital Innovation Management, we discover radical, technology-oriented innovation opportunities, transform them into viable use cases, test them via prototypes and MVPs (both software and hardware); and eventually reintegrate them into the business or spin them off for external commercialization.

At Future Lab, we think that innovation nowadays happens in ecosystems. Therefore, we join forces not only internally but also with academia, startups and companies across industry, operating in an ecosystem that together is stronger than the sum of its parts. Doing so, we facilitate the exchange of knowledge and push the development of technology, from which we derive solutions that have a high impact for us, our customers and more importantly, society as a whole.

Your responsibilities

 * Identify, analyze, and translate business needs into conceptual, logical, and physical data models

 * Evaluate cutting-edge ML/AI models in academic papers for energy applications, and communicate findings to shape project strategies.

 * Support the development, implementation and deployment of state-of-the-art ML/AI models and technologies in digital pipelines together with IoT, Data and ML Engineers

 * Contribute to the venturing of innovative R&D projects, from elaboration of technical ideas and concepts, through development of integrated hardware- and software prototypes and business development

 * Work in a cross-functional team, and communicate effectively technical requirements and business interdependencies across engineering- and management disciplines

 * Keep yourself ahead of emerging technologies, state of the art components and best practices in the areas of robotics, industrial IoT and AI in energy industry

Your profile

 * Advanced bachelor- or early master studies in the field of computer science, mathematics, data science or equivalent

 * Good knowledge in programming skills, especially Python. Familiarity with Matlab would be a plus

 * Experience with data science tools and libraries: NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, PyTorch (or equivalent), Jupyter Notebooks.

 * Well-founded knowledge on Object Oriented Programming, and Software Engineering

 * Experience with version control system git and platforms such as GitHub or GitLab

 * Knowledge of the mathematical foundations of statistical inference and forecasting such as time series analysis, multivariate analysis, cluster analysis, and optimization

 * Desired but not required, experience in formulating and solving optimization problems with python libraries such as pyomo or similar tools

 * Sound Knowledge about Signal Processing especially convolutions, fourier transform

 * Desired but not required, experience with DevOps, CI/CD pipelines or Docker desirable. Knowedge on MLOps, and model registry would be even better

 * Well-founded knowledge about the energy industry, its mechanisms, and challenges; professional experience in the energy industry is a plus

 * An experimental and entrepreneurial mindset and a desire to build things from scratch or optimize ones that already exist

 * Outstanding communication, and documentation skills with the ability to communicate complex technical ideas, regardless of the technical capacity of the audience

 * Passion for technology and the inner desire to solve problems and move things forward

 * Fluent in spoken and written English; German is a plus

Our Benefits

 * We give you flexibility: Thanks to our flexible working hours, you can easily balance your university life and your job.

 * We value your contribution: We support your financial independence with a competitive salary.

 * Recharge your batteries: With us, you have 30 days of vacation per year (Christmas and New Year's Eve are always free).

 * Your further development: We are growing - and want you to grow with us. We offer you interesting and varied tasks and many options for a future job after graduation.

 * And that's not all: We will be happy to discuss all other benefits with you in the recruiting process

Do you have questions?


If you have any questions about this role, please contact: Florian Fecher, florian.fecher@eon.com, +49 1511 1146790.

For further information please contact Ramiya Kamalanathan, ramiya.kamalanathan@eon.com.

Are you already convinced that this is the next step in your career? If yes, we would be happy if you would register and apply online!

Please note that applications via email will not be considered. Please only use our online application system.


What you need to know:

Contract type: Befristet
Work Model: Hybrid
Working time: Teilzeit
Company: E.ON Group Innovation GmbH
Function area: Data / IoT; IT/Digitalisierung
Location: Munich


INKLUSION

Uns ist wichtig, Menschen mit Behinderung ein faires Bewerbungsverfahren zu ermöglichen, in dem sie ihr Bestes zeigen können. Daher wird unsere Schwerbehindertenvertretung frühzeitig in das Verfahren einbezogen. Bitte teile uns über das Bewerbungsformular mit, ob du technische oder organisatorische Anpassungen für das Bewerbungsverfahren benötigst. Wir stellen diese gern zur Verfügung.

Wenn es dir nicht möglich ist, dich online zu bewerben und du stattdessen mit jemandem sprechen möchtest, kontaktiere bitte deinen lokalen Recruiter.

  • Work in a cross-functional team, and communicate effectively technical requirements and business interdependencies across engineering- and management disciplines

  • Keep yourself ahead of emerging technologies, state of the art components and best practices in the areas of robotics, industrial IoT and AI in energy industry

Your profile

  • Advanced bachelor- or early master studies in the field of computer science, mathematics, data science or equivalent

  • Good knowledge in programming skills, especially Python. Familiarity with Matlab would be a plus

  • Experience with data science tools and libraries: NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, PyTorch (or equivalent), Jupyter Notebooks.

  • Well-founded knowledge on Object Oriented Programming, and Software Engineering

  • Experience with version control system git and platforms such as GitHub or GitLab

  • Knowledge of the mathematical foundations of statistical inference and forecasting such as time series analysis, multivariate analysis, cluster analysis, and optimization

  • Desired but not required, experience in formulating and solving optimization problems with python libraries such as pyomo or similar tools

  • Sound Knowledge about Signal Processing especially convolutions, fourier transform

  • Desired but not required, experience with DevOps, CI/CD pipelines or Docker desirable. Knowedge on MLOps, and model registry would be even better

  • Well-founded knowledge about the energy industry, its mechanisms, and challenges; professional experience in the energy industry is a plus

  • An experimental and entrepreneurial mindset and a desire to build things from scratch or optimize ones that already exist

  • Outstanding communication, and documentation skills with the ability to communicate complex technical ideas, regardless of the technical capacity of the audience

  • Passion for technology and the inner desire to solve problems and move things forward

  • Fluent in spoken and written English; German is a plus

Our Benefits

  • We give you flexibility: Thanks to our flexible working hours, you can easily balance your university life and your job.

  • We value your contribution: We support your financial independence with a competitive salary.

  • Recharge your batteries: With us, you have 30 days of vacation per year (Christmas and New Year's Eve are always free).

  • Your further development: We are growing - and want you to grow with us. We offer you interesting and varied tasks and many options for a future job after graduation.

  • And that's not all: We will be happy to discuss all other benefits with you in the recruiting process

Do you have questions?


If you have any questions about this role, please contact: Florian Fecher, florian.fecher@eon.com, +49 1511 1146790.

For further information please contact Ramiya Kamalanathan, ramiya.kamalanathan@eon.com.

managedContent.body:
Unser Anspruch: Connecting everyone to good energy.

Wir wollen eine führende Rolle beim Aufbau einer dezentralen, CO2-freien Energiewelt einnehmen. Das ist eine Langzeitaufgabe, bei der jeder Einzelne gefragt ist. Deshalb stehen bei uns die Menschen an erster Stelle. Es sind ihre vielfältigen Talente, Persönlichkeiten und Erfahrungen, die E.ON einzigartig machen. Unsere Mitarbeiter machen uns erfolgreich und treiben den Wandel bei E.ON voran. #ChangeMakers

Hier zählt Ihr Beitrag: Your energy shapes the future

Damit das möglich wird, sind bei uns eine moderne Arbeitsumgebung und individuelle Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten genauso selbstverständlich wie eine werteorientierte Unternehmenskultur. Wir pflegen einen offenen, wertschätzenden und respektvollen Umgang miteinander, damit jeder sein volles Potenzial entfalten kann. Wir bieten unseren Mitarbeitern ein umfangreiches Lernangebot, das sich an ihren Bedürfnissen orientiert und sie in ihrer Entwicklung optimal unterstützt.
managedContent.title: Deshalb zu E.ON
videos: <iframe width="650" height="350" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Vsisfdb0rPI"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Unsere Mitarbeiter geben jeden Tag ihr Bestes. Wir finden, dafür können sie auch einiges von E.ON erwarten. Deshalb bieten wir unseren Mitarbeitern mehr als nur Gehalt:

Flexibilität: Bei uns arbeiten Sie an spannenden Themen und haben trotzdem genug Zeit für Familie und Hobbies.

Sinnhaftigkeit: Hier zählt Ihr Beitrag! Arbeiten Sie mit uns an nachhaltigen Lösungen, die das Leben der Menschen verbessern.

Entwicklung: Expertenlaufbahn oder Führungsrolle? Sie bestimmen das Ziel, wir unterstützen Sie auf dem Weg dorthin.

Wohlbefinden: Auch unsere Energie ist erneuerbar. Als Mitarbeiter profitieren Sie von vielfältigen Angeboten zu Gesundheit und Wohlbefinden.
managedContent.title: Was wir bieten

managedContent.body:
Dass Sie zu uns passen ist für uns genauso wichtig wie Ihre Fähigkeiten. Finden Sie heraus, ob wir dieselben Werte teilen:

Putting our customer first

Wir sind überzeugt, dass das Verhalten jedes einzelnen Mitarbeiters sich auf den Kundenservice auswirkt. Wenn Sie ein gutes Gespür für Kundenbedürfnisse haben, Kunden zuhören und auf ihre Wünsche eingehen, sind Sie bei uns richtig.

Better together

Wir sind überzeugt, dass wir gemeinsam am erfolgreichsten sind. Wir schätzen Unterschiede. Denn die besten Ideen entstehen immer dann, wenn Menschen mit verschiedenen Hintergründen und Sichtweisen zusammenarbeiten.

Delivering on our promises

Wir sind überzeugt, dass Taten uns erfolgreich machen. Wir halten, was wir versprechen. Wir suchen motivierte und zuverlässige Menschen, die mit ihrer Arbeit etwas bewegen wollen.

Exploring new paths

Wir sind überzeugt, dass Neugier die Grundlage für Innovationen ist. Wir fördern Menschen, die bestehende Konzepte hinterfragen und neue Ansätze ausprobieren, die Fehler als Chance sehen, zu lernen und bessere Lösungen zu finden.

Behaving mindfully

Wir sind überzeugt, dass Gesundheit und eine positive Haltung wichtig für unser Wohlbefinden sind. Wir achten auf uns selbst, gehen respektvoll miteinander um und kümmern uns um unsere Mitmenschen.

job.description:
At E.ON’s Future Lab, we develop and incubate inventions and intellectual property from emerging digital technologies in the areas of robotics, industrial IIoT and AI that enable a sustainable energy future. With a multidisciplinary team consisting of experts in the areas of Energy-, Electronics- and Electrical Engineering, Computer- and Data Science, as well as Digital Innovation Management, we discover radical, technology-oriented innovation opportunities, transform them into viable use cases, test them via prototypes and MVPs (both software and hardware); and eventually reintegrate them into the business or spin them off for external commercialization.

At Future Lab, we think that innovation nowadays happens in ecosystems. Therefore, we join forces not only internally but also with academia, startups and companies across industry, operating in an ecosystem that together is stronger than the sum of its parts. Doing so, we facilitate the exchange of knowledge and push the development of technology, from which we derive solutions that have a high impact for us, our customers and more importantly, society as a whole.

job_description:
Company Description


Snke OS™ is a universally deployable digital B2B platform, founded in 2020 & headquartered in Munich. Emerging technologies continue to drive a digital transformation in the healthcare economy. Our founders recognized the potential for value creation by decoupling & deploying their best-in-class platform & team so that other companies can scale up & innovate efficiently. Fueled by AI & big data analytics, Snke OS delivers the platform & infrastructure that enables partners across the healthcare industry to deploy digital solutions for safer & more efficient interventions.

The 150-person Snke OS team brings a wealth of experience to the new company with backgrounds in large platforms, digital health & software-driven medical technology. Let’s impact the industry together!


Job Description

 * Work on the edge between hospital information systems and modern mobile medical software applications
 * Design and build an efficient, reusable, and reliable SAP/ABAP and C# based backend using modern software architecture concepts
 * Help design new product features regarding generalization and feasibility
 * Help maintain a high code quality and further improve automatization
 * SAP/ABAP mentoring of team colleagues
 * Contribute to the success of future products with your creative ideas and professional attitude


Qualifications

 * Degree in Computer Science / Medical Informatics or similar background
 * 5+ years of experience in SAP/ABAP
 * Proven record of success, both professionally, and in the open source community
 * Knowledge of clinical processes and experience with i.s.h.med
 * Proficient understanding of code versioning tools like Git and Perforce
 * Knowledge or interest in some of the following standards and technologies is a plus: gRPC, REST, services, containerization, DICOM, FHIR
 * Fluent English and the ability to explain and present difficult concepts to a variety of audiences


Additional Information

 * A mutually-supportive, international team
 * Opportunity to build career experience in an exciting international company with a lasting impact on medical technology based in Munich
 * Flexible working hours
 * Secure bicycle storage room
 * Subsidized catering service
 * Subsidized Gold Gym membership and access to Brainlab headquarters modern gym
 * Centrally located, modern work spaces with a great 212m² roof terrace

Ready to apply? We look forward to receiving your online application including your first available start date.

Contact person: Daniel Sypli

managedContent.body:
Together we transform healthcare

At Brainlab, we digitize medical workflows from diagnosis to therapy, and our innovative ecosystem forms the basis for modern healthcare technology. We help healthcare providers build three-dimensional patient-specific models with data that is structured, mapped and aggregated with industry-leading artificial intelligence. This builds the basis of our navigation system for the human body, clinicians can safely remove brain tumors, place screws in the spine precisely, and irradiate breast tumors with millimetric precision.

Our robotics and mixed reality technologies and expertise allow users to connect and innovate between the digital and physical worlds. In addition, Brainlab technologies power the collection of structured long-term data and medical registries. Through the neuroscience of play, Brainlab advances clinical training and education, promoting the adaptation to technological advances and creating digital models of complete interventions. Our digital ecosystem is an open interface and forms a framework for third parties to accelerate innovation in other clinical areas as well.

Brainlab systems are established in around 6700 hospitals in 127 countries to offer doctors and patients better treatment possibilities. At the forefront of health technology for 35 years, the company headquarters are in Munich, and we employ around 2400 people of 87 nationalities in 25 locations.
managedContent.title: About Us

managedContent.body:
At Brainlab, we are dedicated first and foremost to people. To that end, we focus on the development of high technology products that help forge a global medical standard and advance health care.

"Our goals are unswerving—to provide the best possible technology to benefit patients worldwide, and to develop the highest quality products and services to satisfy the needs and exceed the expectations of our customers. To achieve this, we have assembled an organization of professionals who believe that the pursuit of excellence has no finish line."

-Stefan Vilsmeier, CEO
managedContent.title: Our Technology

managedContent.body:
Our culture and spirit

We want innovative contributions. Everyone at Brainlab makes a critical contribution and, therefore, we want people who don’t know their limitations. We hire primarily for talent and passion rather than experience and formal education.

We want authentic people who can build and maintain meaningful and trusting relationships with our customers. Unlike other organizations in which customer contact is monopolized by a select few, almost all employees at Brainlab have the chance for direct customer interaction, from R&D to purchasing.

What diversity means to us

We want cultural diversity. Brainlab is made up of people from all over the world who bring with them their ideas, impressions and know-how. Although we are a German company, only about 45% of our workforce is German. Brainlab is a truly global organization because we understand that globalization comes from inside.

Together we speak the language of innovation
managedContent.title: We are Brainlab
videos: <iframe width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lfglVodx1sA"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
What we value

We value idealists. Brainlab was founded out of a frustration with the status quo in medicine and a desire to create enormous positive change in the industry, regardless of the challenge. These rebellious beginnings have led us to value those with a healthy disrespect for what is the accepted norm. We appreciate those who are obsessed with fighting cancer and improving surgery.

The perks of working at Brainlab

We could provide a standard shopping list of perks that make Brainlab a great place to work—subsidized gourmet meals, free inhouse gym, parking, organized fun and activities outside of the office—but we believe the best thing we have to offer is our hand-selected, inspiring colleagues.

  • Free in-house gym & sports program
  • Award-winning restaurant & subsidized gourmet meals
  • Personal development dedicated to employee development
  • Employee events with a focus on fun
managedContent.title: Our Benefits

managedContent.body:
Job opportunities worldwide

With offices around the globe, we offer plenty of opportunities to find the job you’ll love in the location you want.

Check out our headquarters

Our headquarters, located in Munich, Germany, is built on the site of the former Riem Airport. The historic air traffic control tower is now an integral part of our building and our own history. We invite you to fly through our HQ!

Brainlab offices

Brainlab is headquartered in Munich, Germany and operates offices and subsidiaries in 21 locations across Europe, Asia, Australia, North and South America.
managedContent.title: Brainlab Worldwide

job_description:
As a global semiconductor leader in power systems and IoT, we enable game-changing solutions for green and efficient energy, clean and safe mobility, as well as smart and secure IoT. That's why you probably use our products every day: smartphone, charger, electric toothbrush, coffee machine, refrigerator, remote control and much more. We are looking forward to your application!

Job Description

 * Holistic overview : You implement and improve CI/CD pipelines for industrial equipment software
 * Reliable work : You automate deployment and maintenance tasks in the infrastructure area (Infrastructure as Code)
 * Teamwork is dreamwork : You support the development teams in optimizing DevOps processes, e.g. through automation, system level testing
 * Shape the future : You introduce new strategies for deploying and operating software (containerization, data analysis)
 * Take responsibility : You implement monitoring and logging concepts for optimal monitoring of industrial equipment software
   



Your Profile

 * Study field : You are currently studying Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or similar
 * Experience : You have programming or scripting experience in at least one language
 * Skills : You have knowledge of Linux (e.g. RHEL, CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu) and you have basic knowledge of DevOps toolchain (e.g. GitLab, Jenkins, Configuration management tools like Ansible, Puppet)
 * Way of working : You have an independent way of working and are able to communicate and document your work
 * Personality : You are an analytical thinker and are willing to learn
 * Language skills : You have very good English skills, both written and spoken; German is a plus

Please attach the following documents to your application:

 * CV in English
 * Certificate of enrollment at university
 * Latest grades transcript (not older than 6 months)
 * High school report

Important information:

 * Working part-time : The focus is on studies. Therefore, working student is possible during the lecture period with a maximum of 20 hours per week.
 * Proper students (according to the German law) are welcome : You must be enrolled, and the examination results or modules of your studies must not have been completed yet, so that you can still work in our team for at least 6 months. You must also not be in a semester of leave.
 * You should live close to the site : It is important for us to work with you on site and to integrate you into the team. You should therefore be able to come to the site regularly.
   




Contact:
Britta Johansson

Further links:

 * Find out what we are looking for in your CV
 * Find out how the student application process works with us
 * Discover our student website

#WeAreIn for driving decarbonization and digitalization.
As a global leader in semiconductor solutions in power systems and IoT, Infineon enables game-changing solutions for green and efficient energy, clean and safe mobility, as well as smart and secure IoT. Together, we drive innovation and customer success, while caring for our people and empowering them to reach ambitious goals. Be a part of making life easier, safer and greener.
Are you in?

The Frontend (FE) and Backend (BE) clusters offer a broad range of manufacturing competence. The portfolio represents Power, Bipolar, Sensor, SMART-Power and Diode technologies as well as CMOS, RF-CMOS and embedded flash technologies. The manufacturing sites are located all over the globe, strongly connected and committed to Operational Excellence with strong customer focus.

We are on a journey to create the best Infineon for everyone.
This means we embrace diversity and inclusion and welcome everyone for who they are. At Infineon, we offer a working environment characterized by trust, openness, respect and tolerance and are committed to give all applicants and employees equal opportunities. We base our recruiting decisions on the applicant´s experience and skills.
We look forward to receiving your resume, even if you do not entirely meet all the requirements of the job posting.
Please let your recruiter know if they need to pay special attention to something in order to enable your participation in the interview process.
Click here for more information about Diversity & Inclusion at Infineon.

employerBenefitSummary.comment:
Global career development & benefits

Every person and every career is individual and different. For this reason, Infineon offers its employees many opportunities to develop and grow their careers. This also includes benefits that allow employees to organize their own working day individually and flexibly. Like a puzzle, you can integrate the parts of benefits and career opportunities that suit you best.

Here you can find an overview of our global offers for career development and benefits. Please note that the listed benefits are partly offered depending on the location and can be different.

Are you interested in the benefits and career opportunities of a specific location? Then go to our location pages and see what each location has to offer.

managedContent.body:
Driving decarbonization and digitalization. Together.

Infineon is a global semiconductor leader in power systems and IoT.

A leader in power systems
We are the clear no.1 in power semiconductors and a leading power systems innovator.
Our silicon-, silicon-carbide-, and gallium-nitride-based power, driver, microcontroller, and software solutions are essential to take energy efficiency and green power to the next level.

A leader in IoT
We are a leading one-stop technology partner for smart, energy efficient, and secure IoT solutions.
Our sensors, microcontrollers, and communication devices combined with security technologies and related software are indispensable in bringing the industrial and consumer IoT to life.
managedContent.title: About Infineon

managedContent.body:
Driving decarbonization and digitalization. Together.

Decarbonization
The world must reduce carbon emissions and use energy much more efficiently to secure quality of life for future generations.
With our power system solutions, we are a key enabler in the move to harness renewable energy resources and deliver energy-efficient solutions along the entire electrical energy chain.
Together with our customers and partners, we make more out of less to actively shape a greener future. 

Digitalization
Digital transformation is changing the way we live, work, produce, and consume. 
With our smart IoT devices and systems solutions, we link the real and the digital world, and play a key role in unleashing the full potential of digitalization.
Together with our customers and partners, we make the world smarter so we can all look forward to a better tomorrow.
managedContent.title: Our Vision

managedContent.body:
Semiconductors are crucial to solve the energy challenges of our time and shape the digital transformation. 
This is why Infineon is committed to actively driving decarbonization and digitalization.

As part of our team, you can actively create semiconductor solutions that enable smart mobility, efficient energy management, and the secure capture and transfer of data. We need your contribution to create solutions that help solve the technological, economic and social challenges facing the world today. 

Join our team and together we make life easier, safer, and greener. For a better tomorrow.
managedContent.title: Career

managedContent.body:
Diversity & Inclusion begin with us!

We all have an impact on Diversity & Inclusion through our daily actions. It is our shared responsibility to build an inclusive culture and ensure everyone can contribute – free of prejudice and with equal opportunities for all.

At Infineon we embrace and encourage Diversity and Inclusion, because it is our conviction that this is not just the right thing to do, but also a business imperative that positively affects our bottom line.

In a world that has become faster, closer and more dynamic, it is necessary to embody wider ways of thinking, to focus on the relations between people, and to embrace differences as something that brings value to our actions and lives.

This is why we welcome and value individuality.

Key dimensions of diversity that we pay special attention to:

Age - At Infineon, we appreciate generational differences. Therefore, we have implemented a variety of measures based on each location's situation. Examples include talent programs, flexible work arrangements, employee health and wellness activities for a mature workforce, and trainings like reverse mentoring to understand differences among people from different age groups.

Gender - A balanced mix of women and men, also in management positions, is the foundation of our future success and a key aspect of our Diversity & Inclusion activities. For this reason, we set ourselves targets and specifically work to increase the share of women. In short, recruiting, developing and retaining females is key to achieving our targets.

Ethnic Origin or Nationality - Our diverse workforce is the cornerstone of our success. Hence, we stand for an open organizational culture with people of different social, cultural and national backgrounds. In fact, more than 100 countries are represented among Infineon’s employees. To foster mutual understanding, we offer intercultural training as well as international assignments.

Religion and World View - We want to reflect the different ways people see and understand the world, whether as an expression of religious affiliation, philosophy or politics. We respect and appreciate all employees, regardless of their beliefs, creed or worldview.

Physical and mental ability - It is important to us that everyone feels enough confidence and support to declare a different ability and participate equally with their unique strengths and talents. This involves not only barrier-free access to the workplace, but also the adaptation of work and the workplace to the respective capabilities.

Sexuelle Orientation and Identity -  Who we love and who we are plays an important role in all our lives. It shapes behavior, experience and personality. At Infineon, we celebrate everyone for who they are and for what they contribute. The LGBT* and Friends Community is an example of how we actively support our diverse employees in their work.

Awareness & Competences

Raising awareness for Diversity & Inclusion is a central part of our approach. We help people to build the competencies and mindset that are required to drive a diverse workforce and an inclusive organization. We provide learning opportunities and active exchange within Diversity & Inclusion Networks. And we celebrate Diversity Day, which lays the foundation for the integration of Diversity & Inclusion in our everyday lives.

Dedicated to equal opportunities

We are committed to creating a work environment that is free from prejudice and that offers equal opportunities to everyone – regardless of age, physical and mental ability, ethnic origin and nationality, gender, religion and worldview, and sexual orientation and identity. In Germany, for example, we are a member of the corporate initiative "Charta der Vielfalt" (Diversity Charter).

We show our employees ways to freely develop their potential, we protect them from unfair behavior in the workplace, and we guarantee barrier-free facilities wherever possible. The result: a work environment in which we respect one another and enjoy the time we spend together.

Having a well-balanced work-life is crucial to maintain our enthusiasm and overall wellbeing. ​We want our employees to pursue a satisfying professional career while being able to meet their private, social and health commitments in today’s dynamic environment. Therefore, Infineon offers a range of flexible working options at most locations.
managedContent.title: Diversity & Inclusion
videos: <iframe width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5H7DOM_6yig"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
We want you to be able to balance your career with your personal obligations and desires, such as childcare or a long-awaited break. At Infineon, you decide together with your supervisor how, when and where you work. Flextime models, the chance to take a sabbatical, on-site childcare and more make it easy to strike a balance for most positions and at most locations.

Working from home: The right balance between professional goals and individual freedom

Flexible work arrangements give our employees the opportunity to reconcile their professional goals and private interests with the company’s requirements. We do everything we can to ensure that Infineon is an attractive workplace, because we know that this is crucial for the satisfaction, motivation and performance of our employees.

Flexible working hours: Personal responsibility instead of monitoring

Most of our employees – except those doing shift work – are free to decide for themselves how to schedule their workday. The concept of flexible working hours is part of our corporate culture, because we know that personal responsibility and individuality lead to higher creativity and productivity.

Part-time work: Flexible and tailored to individual needs

Part-time work is not only for families with children. We offer various part-time work models that are designed to meet the requirements of our employees, while also ensuring that the company’s interests are fully served. Depending on a person’s particular phase of life, this can involve more time for voluntary work, hobbies and the family, or for care-dependent relatives. Partial retirement is an attractive alternative for older team members to gently decrease their full-time workload and continue to share their knowledge with our up-and-coming talent.

Sabbatical

Travel the Silk Road, learn Spanish, write a novel – very often, a sabbatical is the best way to fulfill one’s dreams. When people take an extended time away from work, they return with fresh ideas and a new level of dynamism.

Family matters to us

That's why we place great value on creating a family-friendly workplace. Family-friendliness goes even further at Infineon – we also support you in caring for your relatives. In accordance with German national care laws, we guarantee your right to exemptions from work obligations. Our offer:

  • Care for your little researcher: In all large German and Austrian locations, as well as in Singapore, we have company kindergartens or cooperate with nearby daycare centers. Additionally, we look after your children during holiday periods – for example, at the Munich location. Across the globe, we offer different region- or site-specific programs and activities, such as family activities and counselling services.
  • You can switch to part-time hours following or during your parental leave and work from home when necessary. We offer extensive coaching to come up with an appropriate plan.
  • Keep in touch with us: You can also access our intranet during your time off so that you can stay informed about the newest company developments.
managedContent.title: Work-Life-Balance

job.description:
As a global semiconductor leader in power systems and IoT, we enable game-changing solutions for green and efficient energy, clean and safe mobility, as well as smart and secure IoT. That's why you probably use our products every day: smartphone, charger, electric toothbrush, coffee machine, refrigerator, remote control and much more. We are looking forward to your application!

Job Description
  • Holistic overview : You implement and improve CI/CD pipelines for industrial equipment software
  • Reliable work : You automate deployment and maintenance tasks in the infrastructure area (Infrastructure as Code)
  • Teamwork is dreamwork : You support the development teams in optimizing DevOps processes, e.g. through automation, system level testing
  • Shape the future : You introduce new strategies for deploying and operating software (containerization, data analysis)
  • Take responsibility : You implement monitoring and logging concepts for optimal monitoring of industrial equipment software


Your Profile
  • Study field : You are currently studying Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or similar
  • Experience : You have programming or scripting experience in at least one language
  • Skills : You have knowledge of Linux (e.g. RHEL, CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu) and you have basic knowledge of DevOps toolchain (e.g. GitLab, Jenkins, Configuration management tools like Ansible, Puppet)
  • Way of working : You have an independent way of working and are able to communicate and document your work
  • Personality : You are an analytical thinker and are willing to learn
  • Language skills : You have very good English skills, both written and spoken; German is a plus
Please attach the following documents to your application:
  • CV in English
  • Certificate of enrollment at university
  • Latest grades transcript (not older than 6 months)
  • High school report
Important information:
  • Working part-time : The focus is on studies. Therefore, working student is possible during the lecture period with a maximum of 20 hours per week.
  • Proper students (according to the German law) are welcome : You must be enrolled, and the examination results or modules of your studies must not have been completed yet, so that you can still work in our team for at least 6 months. You must also not be in a semester of leave.
  • You should live close to the site : It is important for us to work with you on site and to integrate you into the team. You should therefore be able to come to the site regularly.



Contact:
Britta Johansson

Further links:
  • Find out what we are looking for in your CV
  • Find out how the student application process works with us
  • Discover our student website
